vlive.korean: 아 1학년 망신 다 시키고 다니는 거 아니야? She may cause a bad reputation to all of the freshmen. 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 마지막회✓ 스무살, 잘 살고 있냐고 묻는다면 [ 세상 잘 사는 지은씨2 | EP.16 ]
vlive.english: She may cause a bad reputation to all of the freshmen.

vlive.korean: [드라마 제작 무산되면 망신 당한다] - 진짜 다 얘기해놨어 - 넣어주겠다고? I've already told them. - That I'd invite them to my program? 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처3 ep01_새로운 시즌, 새로운 제작진!
vlive.english: I've already told them. - That I'd invite them to my program?

vlive.korean: 오늘은 망신 당하지 마라~ Don't embarrass yourself today. 듣기 View video 초등학생 관심거리연구소 (Super Cool Kids Lab) : [시즌3.5 마음이 버들버들해]_3화 | 남자는 모른다 누가 나를 좋아하는지
진짜... - 태국에서 나라 망신이네요. Seriously... - We're making a fool of ourselves in Thailand. 듣기 View video TRENDY TV(트렌디 티비) : [사다드림시즌2] 푸껫은 처음이라_2회
vlive.english: Seriously... - We're making a fool of ourselves in Thailand.

vlive.korean: [이게 뭔 망신이야] 너는... 해외 나가서 어글리 코리안 같은 짓을 해야겠니? [You embarrassed us] You did so many things ugly Koreans would do... Did you have to do that? 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처2 하드털이 No.1_사고 유발자 하하(a.k.a 비운의 영국)
vlive.english: [You embarrassed us] You did so many things ugly Koreans would do... Did you have to do that?

examples.korean: He was disgraced and stripped of his title. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 망신을 당하고 타이틀[직함]을 박탈당했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was disgraced and stripped of his title. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her behaviour has brought disgrace on her family. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 행동은 가족에게 수치를 안겨 주었다[가족을 망신시켰다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her behaviour has brought disgrace on her family. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She felt that her failure would bring shame on her family. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 자신의 실패가 가족에게 망신이 될 것이라는 기분이 들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She felt that her failure would bring shame on her family. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You have shamed your family. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 넌 집안을 망신시켰어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You have shamed your family. Add to Wordbook
